headline: Crestline Adds to its Executive Management Team with the Appointment of Orcun Turkay as Vice President of Food & Beverage
summary: FAIRFAX, Va., Jan. 13, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Crestline Hotels & Resorts proudly announces the appointment of Orcun Turkay as Vice President of Food & Beverage, reinforcing its commitment to delivering exceptional dining and entertainment experiences across its rapidly expanding portfolio of lifestyle and full-service hotels. With a reputation for operational excellence, Crestline manages a distinguished collection of properties, including 13 distinctive independent, full-service hotels alongs
